main event: Witnesses reported seeing three bright flashing objects traveling at tremendous speed over Soledad, California.
interesting points: The objects were observed for about 5 minutes and were at different altitudes,The objects exhibited sharp turns and sudden direction changes,The witnesses included a rancher, his wife, and their 17-year-old son,The rancher stated he had seen many aircraft before but these objects were unlike anything he had ever seen,The sighting occurred on February 27, 1955, at approximately 3:30 PM.
sighted object: three bright flashing objects in the sky
witness description: A rancher, his wife, and their 17-year-old son
